data.title: About Stanley
data.text:
Stanley has been doing body therapy for over 40 years and has been a pioneer bringing new form of therapy to Denmark.

He was the first tai chi teacher in Denmark from 1968

He studied with students Professor Cheng Man and John Chung Li

He still practices chi kung on a daily basis

He learned Vispassna meditation in 1985.

Vipassna is the traditional form of Buddhist meditation and it is the original practice, which has been the source of the entire practice of Mindfulness.

He studied acting at the Odin Teater in Holstebro and has taught acting at Statens teaterskole, the National Theatre School of Iceland and Yale University (USA).

In connection with his acting studies, he learned yoga asanas, acrobatics and clown work.

He has taught seminars in body therapy in the USA, Germany, and Iceland. He also taught a course of treatments to optimize breathing at the Art of Living ashram in Bangalore, India as well as at Manuvsion and Stanley Rosenberg Institute in Denmark

He was a National Canadian Champion in doubles in Rowing, 1961
